title: tikv occur `CrashLoopBackOff` after lighning import data, suspend cluster then cancel suspend cluster
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
```
/ # ./tikv-server -V
TiKV
Release Version:   6.5.4
Edition:           Community
Git Commit Hash:   eddbff705ecae68b4d142e71e1cfbe6522aae922
Git Commit Branch: heads/refs/tags/v6.5.4-with-kv-timeout-feature
UTC Build Time:    2023-08-24 07:31:45
Rust Version:      rustc 1.67.0-nightly (96ddd32c4 2022-11-14)
Enable Features:   pprof-fp jemalloc mem-profiling portable sse test-engine-kv-rocksdb test-engine-raft-raft-engine cloud-aws cloud-gcp cloud-azure
Profile:           dist_release
```
### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->
`8c 64g`
### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->


0. deploy cluster in 3 az
1. import data by lightning
2. after lightning finish, suspend cluster
3. cancel suspend cluster


[tikv_config.log](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/files/12450952/tikv_config.log)
[tikv.log](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/files/12451042/tikv.log)

### What did you expect?
tikv restart normal
### What did happened?

2 tikv `crashloopoff`



comments_data.body:
@River2000i: GitHub didn't allow me to assign the following users: lance6716, lyzx2001.

Note that only [tikv members](https://github.com/orgs/tikv/people) with read permissions, repo collaborators and people who have commented on this issue/PR can be assigned. Additionally, issues/PRs can only have 10 assignees at the same time.
For more information please see [the contributor guide](https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/guide/first-contribution.md#issue-assignment-in-github)

<details>

In response to [this](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/issues/15454#issuecomment-1695118008):

>/assign lance6716 lyzx2001


Instructions for interacting with me using PR comments are available [here](https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/guide/pull-requests.md).  If you have questions or suggestions related to my behavior, please file an issue against the [kubernetes/test-infra](https://github.com/kubernetes/test-infra/issues/new?title=Prow%20issue:) repository.
</details>
